EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 2018 Hi, Spring fans! Welcome to another installment of This Month in Spring! First of all: how do you like these monthly roundups? They working for ya? We sure hope so! My sincerest hope is that there's an overwhelming amount of information in each installment. The content reflects a curated aggregation of the latest and greatest over a whole month's time. Even filtered and curated, there's a ton of stuff! People dig this stuff, after all. :)
One thing I've been trying to do a better job of is curating content in other languages. Do you write or produce videos or podcasts in other languages about Pivotal ecosystem technologies like Spring, Cloud Foundry, Kubernetes, Redis, Apache Tomcat, RabbitMQ, Apache Geode, and others? I'd love to hear from you by email <[[mailto: josh@joshlong.com]]> or on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Starbuxman]]>.
We've got a ton of good stuff this month! We're ramping up to SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]>, being held September 24–27 in Washington, D.C. SpringOne will be the biggest event for all things JVM and enterprise. Want to learn about cloud computing, big data, agile, testing, microservices, and so much more, as applied using technologies like Spring? This conference is the gravity well for the industry. Join us in Washington, D.C. for the premier event for JVM developers where you'll hear practitioners from all around the ecosystem talking about their work, and how Pivotal helped them get to production faster. You'll also learn all about the latest and greatest from the source: the engineers working on the technology that underpins your enterprise software.
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-month-in-spring-september-6-2018?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]>
Win a Lunch with Me at SpringOne Platform
Need one more reason to join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]>? Register between now and September 14 for a chance to have lunch with Spring experts Josh Long, Mark Heckler, and James Weaver! Register with code Attendees_Lunch to get $200 off your ticket and your shot at lunch with the Spring Developer Advocates! The winner will be announced on September 17. SpringOne Platform is September 24–27 in Washington, D.C.
Let's do lunch <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]>
SpringOne Tour Rolls into San Francisco
The SpringOne Tour bus comes to San Francisco <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/san-francisco?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]> October 9-10, where it will maneuver cautiously down Lombard St. Then, it’s off to Asia, Europe, and Canada. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]> for more dates.
Put a flower in my hair <[[https://2018.event.springonetour.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-september-2018]]>
